resources.string: This Activity is your home with a menu bar with intents to different activities
This Activity displays your music sorted in albums in list view in linearlayout with nested horizontal linearlayout having imageviews to hold images
This Activity displays your music sorted by artists in list view in linearlayout with nested horizontal linearlayout having imageviews to hold images
This Activity displays your music sorted by generes in list view in linearlayout with textviews
This Activity displays your playlists in listview in linearlayout with nested horiznal linear layout with background colors
